segments.text: Ugh, what a disgusting sight in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's spewing water all over like a broken pipe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is filthy already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, oblivious with her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting gross from the splashes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now those kids rummaging in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that stool, making everything unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies everywhere if he drops them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just hovering, adding to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage plus cookie theftâ€”total sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, inviting more disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden view can't clean up this nasty scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like everything's getting ruined unnecessarily.
segments.speaker: PAR
